name: OGame clutter-free
description: Annoyed with clutter? Freemium is getting too intrusive? This style will get rid of these.
additional_info:
1.3.0
- Hide the fill capacity info

1.2.0
- Hide Commander ad on favourite messages page

1.1.0
- Hide happy hours right skyscraper
- Hide happy hours countdown beneath the left menu

1.0.0

- Hide officers bar
- Hide building queue antimatter ad
- Hide resources antimatter ad
- Hide top bar
- Remove shop, canteen and trader highlights
